data.eml:eml: Species of Bittacomorphella Alexander from China with descriptions of two new species (Diptera: Ptychopteridae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kang, Zehui, Wang, Junchao, Yang, Ding (2012): Species of Bittacomorphella Alexander from China with descriptions of two new species (Diptera: Ptychopteridae). Zootaxa 3557: 31-39, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.282911
